page.title: 11W.O.E BUILDING SOCIETY
page.content: { { {THE WEST OF ENGLAND BUILDING SOCIETY HAS MORE{CUSTOMERS}THAN ANY OTHER BUILDING SOCIETY IN BIDEFORD. A BUILDING SOCIETY IS A PLACE WHERE PEOPLE{INVEST}THEIR MONEY AND WHERE OTHER PEOPLE BORROW MONEY IF THEY WANT TO BUY A HOUSE. THEY HAVE JOINED UP WITH ANOTHER{BUILDING SOCIETY}BECAUSE THEY WERE BEING{SWALLOWED}UP BY OTHER BUILDING SOCIETIES BIGGER THAN THEM. THE WESTERN COUNTIES (AS IT WAS CALLED BEFORE THE 1ST OF JULY 1985) NEW BUILDING WAS OPENED BY{R.M.HUXTABLE. ESQ{HIGH SHERIFF OF DEVON}ON THE 8TH OF OCTOBER 1982. THEY THOUGHT THAT THIS BUILDING SOCIETY WOULD COST THREE QUARTERS OF A MILLION POUNDS BUT IT COST{ONE AND A QUARTER MILLION
